documents.document: @IxDAwards I vote for #nzvisagateway for the 2017 People's Choice Award! Vote at https://t.co/TqFk1fpLKr
@The_Donal that sure was
The US are approaching a whole new level of crazy!!!
@NorthwardsDS @InDesign ooh the fun we will have I can hardly wait!
SkyGo app on iPad working but @SKYNZ why the 38 second delay, doesn't seem very 'live' to me.
@SparkNZ I have sent a DM ... Let me know if you are going to look into it or I'll call.
FFS @SparkNZ why am I still receiving bills when we cancelled our account over two months ago!!!
@The_Donal I sure was :)
Congrats @SparkNZ you are officially the worst company I've dealt with!
@WeedonsWorld surely the greatest cheat in rugby would be William Webb Ellis?
@SparkNZ she was very helpful and explained the situation... Frustrating but it's getting sorted
To the @SparkNZ lady I was just talking to, thanks for clarifying the situation and sorry I did not intentionally hang up on you.. Honestly!
@SparkNZ seriously! Booked moving our fibre to new house (with fibre) a week or so ago, they did nothing... Great flippen service!!
@NorthwardsDS so my "alright duck" just doesn't cut it? :)
Just when you thought @RealStevenAdams couldn't get any cooler http://t.co/RybJWQpxZl
@NorthwardsDS @DNA_NZ @gmpm and funnily enough you're having a whinge :)
@NorthwardsDS @DNA_NZ @gmpm it could have been worse you could have got England?! ;)
Genius!! @marcuslush is working his way through the Edmonds cookbook, follow his progress on @LushysHomeBake :)
No mention of Chelsea's dad, he must have been a bit of a nobody ... “@NZStuff: Chelsea Clinton pregnant http://t.co/ruSOkhYGJh”
@NorthwardsDS Armed with post-it's and a vivid?
@bpujji @The_Donal haha twitter gold!!!
I'm still gutted @piriweepu plays for the Blues and not the 'canes ... He just so flippen cool :)
@The_Donal I've noticed that too :) every now and then I like to go retro and enter my pin ... Just 'cause :)
@Emjmac what happened with your glasses?
@marcuslush I remember zonkey rides in Tijuana in the 80s, the stripes were painted on :)
Damn!! @CoryJane1080 is out with a hamstring injury... I hope that's not from over aggressive spooning :)
Yay!! “@juliansavea7: Happy to say I have resigned with the hurricanes and nzru. Been a very hard decision but I'm glad it's all over.”
@brentneave now you just need to progress to 'Why would you?!*#!' :)
@The_Donal I think the missus is more entitled to that drink :)
@Emjmac yay :) we'll be pleased when you're back .... Good luck today
@AuntyJock very nice indeed :) good on him!
@bpujji automatically I'm seeing business cards in Fireworks ... Sorry I just can't let it go :)
@The_Donal Shees dramatic much :)
Bit of a rattle in Whitby .... Felt by us inside but not those outside!
@CoryJane1080 fan-bloody-tastic!!
Geez I wish NZ media would up their game “@NZStuff: Wallabies: Cooper will play a blinder http://t.co/RGPPSkKV” #overthesepointlessarticles
@mikecollinge Hosea went of his own accord ... I think maybe you need to remember why Hammett is there and why Joseph isn't !!
@mikecollinge knew you'd like that :) me too
Nooooooo!!! "@Andrew_Mulligan: Dan Carter's pulled a groin muscle according to @JimKayes and his #RWC is in doubt. Wow."
@thatboyneave @janeave I wondered who was responsible .... Very nice indeed :)
Justin Marshall "the crowd are gonna have to the take their medicine 'cos that was definitely forward" #whatatwat!!
Tantrums and tiaras... “@SportOrDai: Cleary on Warriors "Its quite an achievement, but I guess Russia will be playing Namibia or something"
At the local supermarket... Australian mandarins, pears, rockmelons and oranges, how do you like them apples Australia? #getoveryourself
I've never been a fan of Grant Fox's commentary but after suffering with Justin Marshall recently, I now have a new appreciation
Snow and mulled wine #lovingmyjob :)
@The_Donal have I taught you nothing ... you can't get in the way of a kiwi and their ABs jersey .... It's like an Irishman and Guinness :)
@The_Donal good luck with that bro :)
Gutted @Powza13 is heading to the blues!!!
#TDF over for 2011 ... Is it too early to start counting down to 2012?
@stjohncraner I don't have a prob with it :) Wouldn't want the 2 ABs wear white jerseys tho, what are your guys thinking? What about Samoa!!
@stjohncraner seems a rather odd time for a PR stunt :)
@darrylgray @catchcam a couple of online projects snuck in on boards too :) they looked flippen awesome tho
@catchcam oh well all I can say is I've had one of mine for over 4 years & other for 2 with no issues, my verbatim one has been good too
@catchcam really? I have 2 WD hard drives one has taken a few big knocks and still works without any probs
Respect !!! “@CoryJane1080: If I stay in NZ It will be for the @Hurricanesrugby..I grew up loving the team and still do..”

@pitchandtone me too!!

Cmon you Breakers :)
